trans-unit.source: Implement IPolicyExportExtension to insert custom binding policy assertions in the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) information.
trans-unit.target: Implemente IPolicyExportExtension inserir asserções de política de enlaces personalizada as informações do Web Services Description Language (WSDL).

trans-unit.source: Implement the IPolicyExportExtension interface on a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement?displayProperty=fullName> object to write statements about endpoint capabilities or requirements into the WSDL information exposed by a particular endpoint.
trans-unit.target: Implementa a interface de IPolicyExportExtension num <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement?displayProperty=fullName>objeto para escrever instruções sobre requisitos para as informações de WSDL expostas por um ponto final específico ou capacidades de ponto final.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Typically the binding element is one that implements some feature, but this is not required.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, o elemento de enlace é aquele que implementa alguma funcionalidade, mas isto não é necessário.

trans-unit.source: To load your policy exporter from a configuration file, implement a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.BindingElementExtensionElement?displayProperty=fullName> that returns the policy exporter <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement> object.
trans-unit.target: Para carregar o exportador de política de um ficheiro de configuração, implemente um <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.BindingElementExtensionElement?displayProperty=fullName>que devolve o exportador de política <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement>objeto.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.BindingElementExtensionElement?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The policy exporter is used by [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] to use policy assertions to communicate to clients the existence of that custom binding requirement or endpoint capability.
trans-unit.target: O exportador de política é utilizado pelo [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] utilizar asserções de política para comunicar com os clientes a existência dessa capacidade de requisito ou o ponto final do enlace personalizado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IPolicyExportExtension.ExportPolicy%2A> method takes the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExporter> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext> objects.

Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext.GetBindingAssertions%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext.GetMessageBindingAssertions%2A>, and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext.GetOperationBindingAssertions%2A> methods to obtain collections of policy assertions that have already been exported at various scopes.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext.GetBindingAssertions%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext.GetMessageBindingAssertions%2A>, e <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext.GetOperationBindingAssertions%2A>métodos para obter as coleções de asserções de política que já tenham sido exportadas em vários âmbitos.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext.GetOperationBindingAssertions%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext.GetMessageBindingAssertions%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext.GetBindingAssertions%2A>

trans-unit.source: Then add your custom policy assertion object to the appropriate collection.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, adicione o objeto de asserção de política personalizada para a colecção apropriada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext.Contract%2A> property exposes the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription> for the endpoint that is being exported.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext.Contract%2A>propriedade expõe o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription>para o ponto final que está a ser exportado.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext.Contract%2A>

trans-unit.source: This allows the IPolicyExportExtension extension to correctly scope their exported policy assertions.
trans-unit.target: Isto permite que a extensão de IPolicyExportExtension definir o âmbito corretamente as asserções de política exportado.

trans-unit.source: For example, security attributes in code may add behaviors to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription> that indicate where security policy assertions should be added.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, atributos de segurança no código podem adicionar comportamentos para o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription>que indicar onde asserções de política de segurança devem ser adicionadas.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription>

trans-unit.source: The IPolicyExportExtension mechanism only supports exporting policy assertions in WSDL.
trans-unit.target: O mecanismo de IPolicyExportExtension só suporta Exportar asserções de política no WSDL.

trans-unit.source: To export custom WSDL elements you must use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension> mechanism to modify the WSDL directly.
trans-unit.target: Para exportar os elementos WSDL personalizados, tem de utilizar o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension>mecanismo para modificar diretamente o WSDL.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension>

trans-unit.source: Once custom policy assertions have been attached to the WSDL information, clients can detect and import the custom binding assertions by using an <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IPolicyImportExtension> object.
trans-unit.target: Depois de tem sido anexadas asserções de política personalizada para as informações de WSDL, os clientes conseguem detetar e importar as asserções de enlaces personalizada utilizando um <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IPolicyImportExtension>objeto.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IPolicyImportExtension>

trans-unit.source: Implement to include for exporting a custom policy assertion about bindings.
trans-unit.target: Implemente a incluir para exportar uma asserção de política personalizada sobre enlaces.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext.GetBindingAssertions%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext.GetMessageBindingAssertions%2A>, and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext.GetOperationBindingAssertions%2A> methods to obtain collections of policy assertions that have already been exported at various scopes.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext.GetBindingAssertions%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext.GetMessageBindingAssertions%2A>, e <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext.GetOperationBindingAssertions%2A>métodos para obter as coleções de asserções de política que já tenham sido exportadas em vários âmbitos.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext.GetOperationBindingAssertions%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext.GetMessageBindingAssertions%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext.GetBindingAssertions%2A>

trans-unit.source: Then add your <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IPolicyExportExtension> object to the appropriate collection.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, adicione o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IPolicyExportExtension>objeto à coleção adequada.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IPolicyExportExtension>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExporter"></xref> that you can use to modify the exporting process.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExporter"> </xref> que pode utilizar para modificar o processo de exportar.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext"></xref> that you can use to insert your custom policy assertion.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext"> </xref> que pode utilizar para inserir a asserção de política personalizada.
